World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 22 日星期四 05:49:29 GMT 120
Chile risks repeat of deadly wildfires because of climate change, report saysDeadly wildfires like those that burned through central Chile and killed at least 133 people this month will become more likely in the South American country as climate change makes the world hotter and drier, according to a report released on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 05:17:03 GMT MOYF5LWBQBJRNDHDVV67Q5MYK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/chile-risks-repeat-deadly-wildfires-because-climate-change-report-says-2024-02-22/Alexander Villegas可持续发展气候与能源
Two killed after barge hits bridge near China's Guangzhou, plunging vehicles in waterTwo people were killed after a barge collided with a bridge over a waterway in China's Pearl River Delta near Guangzhou city, causing part of the bridge to break off, plunging vehicles into the water, Chinese state media reported on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 05:08:17 GMT OPSBUSO5NK6HBB3TWI7QZSZVY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/two-killed-after-barge-hits-bridge-near-chinas-guangzhou-plunging-vehicles-water-2024-02-22/Reuters世界中国
Israel sounds sirens in Eilat, intercepts aerial targetIsrael's military said it intercepted a target in the area of the Red Sea on Thursday after sirens warning of incoming rockets and missiles sounded in the southern city of Eilat. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 04:55:23 GMT TXL2CJIQGBK2VNGN5OCGEFORKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-sounds-sirens-eilat-intercepts-aerial-target-2024-02-22/Reuters世界中东
Maldives visit of Chinese survey ship could trigger Indian Ocean security concernsA Chinese research ship is set to arrive in the Maldives on Thursday, global ship-tracking data showed, just three months after a similar vessel visited the Indian Ocean and sparked New Delhi's security concerns. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 04:18:09 GMT 5O6OWLXJXVMWVFGDEHPSJ7JQ6A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/maldives-visit-chinese-survey-ship-could-trigger-indian-ocean-security-concerns-2024-02-22/Ryan Woo世界亚太地区
Philippine coast guard says Chinese claim of intrusion 'inaccurate'A Philippine coast guard official on Thursday described as "inaccurate" its Chinese counterpart's claim that a fisheries vessel "illegally intruded" into Beijing's waters. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 03:15:25 GMT 52SNUBY4XNJ3FMZD6OEXFXY6YI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-coast-guard-says-chinese-claim-intrusion-inaccurate-2024-02-22/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukraine leader downplays loss of Avdiivka, seeks faster supportPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy downplayed Ukraine's loss of the eastern town of Avdiivka to Russian forces and called for faster support from allies as the war against Russia neared the two-year mark, in comments broadcast on Wednesday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 03:12:21 GMT UN76XV3JBJNF3H4WWAWHYSGXJM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-leader-downplays-loss-avdiivka-seeks-faster-support-2024-02-22/Reuters世界欧洲
US State Dept OKs potential sale of military gear to Taiwan, Pentagon saysThe U.S. State Department has approved the potential sale to Taiwan of about $75 million of advanced tactical data link system upgrade planning, the Pentagon said on Wednesday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 03:04:22 GMT WTQUH4UCIBJQRDOHUY3GWW6XYY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-state-dept-oks-pottial-sale-military-gear-taiwan-pentagon-says-2024-02-22/Reuters世界美国
Australian retired bishop charged with child sex abuseA retired Roman Catholic bishop appeared in court in remote Western Australia on Thursday on charges of sexual offences against children, including two counts of rape. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 03:00:14 GMT GHLWDOH4NNN2TMB5EHUPTRRXGE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australian-retired-bishop-charged-with-child-sex-abuse-2024-02-22/Alasdair Pal世界亚太地区
Sydney martial arts instructor denied bail for murder of family of threeA martial arts instructor who allegedly killed a 7-year-old child and his mother in a Taekwondo studio before driving elsewhere and stabbing the boy's father to death was denied bail on Thursday at a hearing held by his hospital bed in Sydney. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 02:49:40 GMT MPCNXHKDHVLHVBQOYZVYAMK5JU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sydney-martial-arts-instructor-denied-bail-murder-family-third-2024-02-22/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Taiwan president to visiting US delegation: hope to see more Taiwan-US exchanges this yearTaiwan President Tsai Ing-wen told a visiting U.S. delegation of lawmakers on Thursday the island hoped to see more Taiwan-U.S. exchanges this year and Taiwan will continue to engage with the world. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 02:33:36 GMT CDXLM6ZSCNMFVJQDH5OSPZHJXY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-visiting-us-delegation-hope-see-more-taiwan-us-exchanges-this-2024-02-22/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea doctors to keep up protests as hospitals turn patients awayThe emergency departments at three of South Korea's biggest hospitals were on red alert on Thursday as trainee doctors vowed to stay off the job in protest at government plans to increase medical school admissions to boost the healthcare sector. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 02:00:28 GMT V6FP7OEP6FIPLEBTMKR5MQDXSY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/over-8000-south-korea-doctors-join-walkout-over-med-school-quotas-2024-02-22/Ju-Min Park, Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
